arts.ttl: Real Madrid turn down chance to sign Trent Alexander-Arnold's Liverpool teammate
arts.sum: Real Madrid reportedly turn down the chance to sign one of Trent Alexander-Arnold's Liverpool teammates at the end of the season.

arts.ttl: Three questions and three answers from Deportiva Minera 0-5 Real Madrid
arts.sum: This was the first time in over eight years that Real Madrid managed more than 20 shots on target in a single game, and so it’s logical that many of those to stand out would be offensive players. A big win puts Real Madrid into the next round of the Copa del Rey

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti on potential Real Madrid exit in January – ‘It’s his decision’
arts.sum: Real Madrid manager Carlo Ancelotti has defended the performance of Endrick Felipe after the Brazilian returned to the starting line-up against Deportiva Minera in the Copa del Rey. Los Blancos ran out 5-0 winners, but Endrick was not on the scoresheet in his first start in three months. Despite this, Ancelotti was content with his […] The post Carlo Ancelotti on potential Real Madrid exit in January – ‘It’s his decision’ appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Report: Liverpool table €50m offer for Real Madrid star; coming weeks could be decisive
arts.sum: Liverpool have an offer on the table worth €50m for Real Madrid star Aurelien Tchouameni, according to Spanish outlet Fichajes. The offer consists of an initial payment of €35 million, with the remaining €15 million to be paid next season. This move reignites the Reds’ long-standing interest in the French international, whom they previously tried […] The post Report: Liverpool table €50m offer for Real Madrid star; coming weeks could be decisive appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Real Madrid allege racial abuse against Vinicius Junior during Valencia clash
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Vinicius Junior was sent off against Valencia for the second time in three years at Mestalla on Friday night, with the first encounter greatly marred by racial abuse suffered by the Brazilian. Now the club channel for Los Blancos has found footage where it appears he has suffered further racism. Vinicius was […] The post Real Madrid allege racial abuse against Vinicius Junior during Valencia clash appeared first on Football España.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappé sends thank you message to Real Madrid fans
arts.sum: Real Madrid star Kylian Mbappé has this week moved to reveal his appreciation for the club’s supporters. This comes after the Frenchman was rewarded for his efforts over recent weeks…

arts.ttl: When was the last time neither Real Madrid nor Barcelona were in the Super Cup final?
arts.sum: This week, Saudi Arabia will host the 41st edition of the Spanish Super Cup. The first semi-final will see Athletic Club, the reigning Copa del Rey champions, face 2023/24 LaLiga runners-up Barcelona - a repeat of the 2021 final which the Basques won in extra-time. The other semi-final between LaLiga champions Real Madrid and Copa del Rey runners-up Mallorca, will be played on Thursday.

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti labels Real Madrid star ‘a gift’ after win over Deportiva Minera
arts.sum: Real Madrid head coach Carlo Ancelotti has on Monday moved to reiterate his appreciation for a leading member of the club’s midfield ranks. The player in question? Luka Modrić. Veteran…

arts.ttl: Carlo Ancelotti: “Luka Modric is a gift for football”
arts.sum: Real Madrid beat Deportivo Minera 5-0 in Murcia to advance to the Round of 16 of the Copa del Rey. After the game, Carlo Ancelotti spoke to the media about the match, praising Luka Modric’s quality. “We played a good match, committed from the start.

arts.ttl: Five-star Real Madrid cruise past fourth-tier Deportiva Minera in Copa del Rey
arts.sum: Deportiva Minera 0-5 Real Madrid Real Madrid never even gave the potential for a Copa del Rey hiccup to unfold against Deportiva Minera, as they cruised to a win in their season debut in the competition.
